subject: Report "to implement" tests.
msgSnippet: Hi, I would like to see progress in (acceptance) tests not yet implemented. I want these reported differently than normal failures. Is there a way in JUnit to
messageBody:
Hi,

I would like to see progress in (acceptance) tests not yet implemented. I want these reported differently than normal failures. Is there a way in JUnit to distinct between expected failing tests and "normal" failing tests?

So in a report I would like to see something like:

Tests: 42
Failures:0
Errors: 0
Ignored: 0
To implement: 12

Regards, Lars
